Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Thief: +2 damage with finesse melee weapons
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 4
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts flat-footed vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Twin Feint: (2) Strikes with a melee weapon in each hand, inflicting flat-footed vs. the second
Unbalancing Blow: Critical hits inflict flat-footed vs. self attacks until the end of the next turn
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +11 (dexterity; expert); Will: +9 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Magic
Magic Notes: Magical Trickster: Spell attacks vs. flat-footed foes inflict sneak attack damage
